subtitle: pieces on the chessboard can only travel
in their own trajectory so the bishop
travels diagonally the Knight travels
2-1 The Rook travels vertically and
horizontally a pawn a simple Pawn you
can only travel one step at a time
except this first move two steps when it
comes to the other side of the board it
turns into a queen and a queen can
travel all directions the pawn is an
example of a soul coming down to this
earth initially it may not seem to have
as much power as the other pieces true
movement lies in the the domain of those
that may seem simple and humble serve on
the front line like the pawns there's
only one step at a time but when they
conquer they reach the other end they
Vanquish the enemy they become Queens
their movement is far greater than the
Angels which are the Rooks the Bishops
and the Knights and you'll see this
throughout life greatness you can be
